Message:
They had found out
I was a witch.

Big Sis turned to me and
gave me an awkward smile.

“I’m not a witch,
so they won’t capture me.
Sol, you go get a headstart
and I’ll catch up.”

How could I not?
I was so scared...

The Inquisition’s famous for
their cruel torture methods.

Not a single witch captured
has ever returned from there.

I escaped outside the city
and waited for Big Sis.

But no matter how long
I waited, she never came.

Big Sis only ever gives
that kind of smile...
when she’s telling
one of her bad lies...

My worries only grew
from there, and soon,
I caught wind of a rumor.

That a witch named
Lunalynn had been captured.
